query:
INSERT INTO tools (name, description, category, url, pricingModel, features, useCase, tags, tierRequired, status) VALUES
('HeyGen', 'AI video platform with realistic talking avatars. Create professional videos with AI presenters in 175+ languages. Features include custom avatars, voice cloning, video translation, and templates. Perfect for marketing, training, and content creation.', 'Video Creation', 'https://www.heygen.com/', 'Freemium', '["AI avatars", "175+ languages", "Voice cloning", "Video translation", "Custom avatars", "Templates", "Lip sync", "API access"]', 'Marketing videos, training content, social media, product demos, presentations', '["video", "avatars", "AI presenter", "multilingual", "marketing"]', 'lite', 'approved'),
('Synthesia', 'Enterprise AI video platform with 230+ AI avatars and 140+ languages. Create professional videos from text with custom avatars, voice-overs, and collaboration features. Industry-leading for business video creation.', 'Video Creation', 'https://www.synthesia.io/', 'Paid', '["230+ AI avatars", "140+ languages", "Custom avatars", "Voice cloning", "Video templates", "Collaboration", "Brand kit", "API access", "Enterprise security"]', 'Corporate training, marketing, sales enablement, HR communications, product demos', '["video", "enterprise", "avatars", "training", "business", "multilingual"]', 'pro', 'approved');

UPDATE tools SET 
description = 'AI-powered video editing and creation platform. Features AI avatars, AI Twin (create digital version of yourself), automatic captions, eye contact correction, script writing, and video generation from text. Perfect for content creators and marketers.',
features = '["AI avatars", "AI Twin creation", "Auto captions", "Eye contact correction", "Script writer", "Video from text", "AI editing", "Dubbing", "Zoom enhancement"]',
useCase = 'Social media content, marketing videos, AI avatar creation, video editing, content repurposing'
WHERE name = 'Captions.ai' OR name = 'Captions';

description = 'AI-powered video editing and creation platform. Features AI avatars, AI Twin (create digital version of yourself), automatic captions, eye contact correction, script writing, and video generation from text. Perfect for content creators and marketers.',
